Title: Relates to prehospital emergency medical services for individuals in substance use recovery
Summary: Relates to prehospital emergency medical services for individuals in substance use recovery; requires policies, procedures, and protocols to be developed to identify individuals in substance use recovery and to avoid treatment that could compromise such individuals' recovery.
LawCode: Add ยง3000-e, amd ยง3053, Pub Health L
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the public health law, in relation to prehospital emergency medical services for individuals in substance use recovery
